name: TouhouWare: Winter Edition
description:
In the harsh cold of winter, Suika is fast asleep dreaming about everyone's activities in snow-coated Gensokyo.

Play up to ⑨ exciting microgames, including but not limited to: ice sculpting, snowball flinging, and snow angel-ing!

Everything is controlled by the mouse (Not Nazrin).

Updated on the 30th with some tweaks
